feed.title: Cup Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cup: v3.0.1
entry.content:
Changes

  • Updated dependencies, resolving a security vulnerability
  • Fixed a bug where Cup tried to authenticate to registries that should have been ignored (#58, reported by @johnnyggalt)

entry.title: New release for Cup: v3.0.2
entry.content:
Changes

  • Fixed a bug where image references may not be parsed correctly

entry.title: New release for Cup: v3.0.3
entry.content:
Changes

  • Fixes a UI bug with text overflowing in the web UI

entry.title: New release for Cup: v3.0.4
entry.content:
Changes

  • Fixed a bug with copying image pull commands and image digests in the web UI (reported by @John710 in #62)

entry.title: New release for Cup: v3.1.0
entry.content:
Changes

  • If an image has specified a URL in a label, you can now visit it from the web UI. It's also returned from the API for usage with integrations.
